590:3: āryāvalokiteśvarabodhisattvo gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caryāṃ caramāṇo vyavalokayati sma|
590:13: ihaṃ śāriputra sarvadharmāḥ śūnyatālakṣaṇā anutpannā aniruddhā amalā na vimalā nonā na paripūrṇāḥ|
590:22: na vidyā nāvidyā na vidyākṣayo nāvidyākṣayo yāvanna jarāmaraṇaṃ na jarāmaraṇakṣayo na duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgā na jñānaṃ na prāptitvam||
590:27: tasmājjñātavyaḥ prajñāpāramitāmahāmantro mahāvidyāmantro'nuttaramantro'samasamamantraḥ sarvaduḥkhapraśamanaḥ satyamamithyatvāt prajñāpāramitāyāmukto mantraḥ|
590:28: tadyathā- gate gate pāragate pārasaṃgate bodhi svāhā||
